original_title: Khrouchtchev à la conquête de l'Amérique
overview: The story of the unconditional, no-holds-barred tour of America by Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev, leader of World Communism and America's arch nemesis, during 13 sun-filled days in the fall of 1959.

production_companies.name: Les Films du Point du Jour

title: Khrushchev Does America
